feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 7:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: W 37 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
